__e: Maybe somehow we have to prove we're worthy before he'll trust us with his might.
He has accepted it is his responsibility. He will prove himself worthy and lift the curse if you give him one more chance.
You are wise to seek my counsel, but only through faith will you prove worthy of my benevolence.
You have simply found a life that is worthy of you.
You have no son, but a daughter who is just as good.
If you're going to fight, the adversary must be worthwhile.
But... When we meet again, I'll be worth your while.
Maybe ever. If I am worthy of him.
And those who run away from it because they are afraid or because they do not believe they are worthy of it.
I promise you That I will live every day wanting to be worthy of you, Appreciating all that you are
But none of you could ever hope to be worthy of her or even understand the kind of woman she was.
I'll do whatever it takes to make myself worthy in their eyes.
And I have bent over backwards trying to prove that I am worthy of your love, but I need you to tell me where you stand, how you feel right now.
Unworthy of the woman I love, I will continue to play the role life has given me.
Now, they must prove themselves worthy to remain among us.
I would have told you everything but now I see you are not worthy of it.
One Word: Getting the Map depends on whether our force is strong enough
